description:
Hayate, Nagi, and Maria all go to a hot spring inn, only to find that Yukiji has been murdered!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beautiful Young Lady Saw Great Detective! Case of Murdered Teacher
Bijin Ojou-sama Meitantei wa Mita! Yukemuri Onna Kyoushi Satsujinjikon
美人お嬢さま名探偵は見た! 湯けむり女教師殺人事件
